content.rendered:
Exception:

weblogic.nodemanager.common.configexception: native version is enabled but nodemanager native library could not be loaded

Solution:

For Weblogic10 & 11g

  1. Go to your $WL_HOME/common/nodemanager/
  2. Edit the nodemanger.properties file ( If not available create it)
  3. Change the value of NativeVersionEnabled=true to NativeVersionEnabled=false
  4. Restart the Nodemanager

For Weblogic 12c

  1. Go to your Domain/nodemanager directory (i.e: /apps/oracle-weblogic/domains/mwidomain/nodemanager/)
  2. Edit the nodemanger.properties file ( If not available create it)
  3. Change the value of NativeVersionEnabled=true to NativeVersionEnabled=false
  4. Restart the Nodemanager

Hope it helps.

Cheers,

A K S A R A V

Write to us at : aksarav@mwinventory.in

 Follow us on Facebook

 To Join our Community in Whatsapp – Click here
